testcase.name: runScenario["Verify Category selection is a sub-category", "Plant Category Selection"](1)
testcase.system-out: @ui @plants @TC_UI_PLANT_ADM_004 Scenario: Verify Category selection is a sub-category # src/test/resources/features/ui/plants/plant_category.feature:8 === Starting UI Test: Verify Category selection is a sub-category === Given user is logged in as admin # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.login.LoginSteps.userIsLoggedInAsAdmin() And user is on the Plants List page # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.login.LoginSteps.userIsOnThePlantsListPage() When user clicks on "Add a Plant" button # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantListSteps.userClicksOnButton(java.lang.String) Then user should be navigated to "Add Plants" page # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantListSteps.userShouldBeNavigatedToPage(java.lang.String) Expected Sub-Categories: [Rose, Lotus, Banana, Mango, Rose UK] Actual Options in Dropdown: [Banana, Lotus, Mango, Rose, Rose UK] And the category dropdown should contains sub-categories "Rose, Lotus, Banana, Mango, Rose UK" # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantCategorySteps.categoryDropdownShouldContainSubCategories(java.lang.String) And the category dropdown should not contain main categories "Flower, Fruits, Herbs" # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantCategorySteps.categoryDropdownShouldNotContainMainCategories(java.lang.String) === Finished UI Test: Verify Category selection is a sub-category ===

testcase.name: runScenario["Verify that Plant Name, Sub category, Price, Quantity are mandatory", "Plant form validation"](16)
testcase.system-out: @ui @plants @TC_UI_PLANT_ADM_002 Scenario: Verify that Plant Name, Sub category, Price, Quantity are mandatory # src/test/resources/features/ui/plants/plant_validation.feature:5 === Starting UI Test: Verify that Plant Name, Sub category, Price, Quantity are mandatory === Given user is logged in as admin # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.login.LoginSteps.userIsLoggedInAsAdmin() And user is on the Plants List page # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.login.LoginSteps.userIsOnThePlantsListPage() When user clicks on "Add a Plant" button # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantListSteps.userClicksOnButton(java.lang.String) And user leaves Plant Name, Sub category, Price and Quantity empty # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantValidationSteps.userLeavesRequiredFieldsEmpty() And user clicks on "save" button # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantListSteps.userClicksOnButton(java.lang.String) Then validation message "Plant Name is required" should be displayed for field "name" # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantValidationSteps.validationMessageShouldBeDisplayedForField(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And validation message "Category is required" should be displayed for field "categoryId" # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantValidationSteps.validationMessageShouldBeDisplayedForField(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And validation message "Price is required" should be displayed for field "price" # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantValidationSteps.validationMessageShouldBeDisplayedForField(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And validation message "Quantity is required" should be displayed for field "quantity" # com.example.ui.stepDefinitions.plants.PlantValidationSteps.validationMessageShouldBeDisplayedForField(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) === Finished UI Test: Verify that Plant Name, Sub category, Price, Quantity are mandatory ===
